resources.string: Kåfjord is an app developed to simply gather information about the summer house and the surrounding area.\n\n

1. When entering you will find light switches on the left hand. By switching off the top switch you will turn on the floor heat.

 2. Further down the hallway, on the left by the kitchen, you will find the ventilation panel. Turn the ventilation on.

 3. Here you will also find a panel to turn on the water. Turn on the water.

1. Before leaving turn on the top switch by the entrance door to lower the floor heat.

 2. Turn off the ventilation.

 3. Turn off the water.

 4. Vacuum the summer house and clean the bathrooms.

 5. Put everything you used back where you found it.
